name: Missile System Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the Jericho family of long-range missiles, the Janissary SRM, and several other kill vehicles carrying more exotic payloads.

name: Inert Mass Driver Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the Jezail family of duranium-penetrator mass drivers, as well as several other inert-projectile electromagnetic kinetic weapons.

name: Exotic Mass Driver Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct a series of mass driver weapons with exotic payloads such as fission-reactive shells and magnetic resonance-seeking charged crystal splinters.

name: Kadur Crusader Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct combat-focused ship hulls devised by the Kadur Theocracy and still available to the Kadur Remnant.

name: Kadur Guardian Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct fleet support-focused ship hulls devised by the Kadur Theocracy and still available to the Kadur Remnant.

name: Kadur Judgement Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct dedicated heavy anti-capital ship hulls and weapons devised by the Kadur Theocracy and still available to the Kadur Remnant.
